marquee.span: “Eagle Excellence is being respectful, responsible, and ready to learn. We believe in a brighter tomorrow for each and every student.”

span.span: All of Colonel Crawford Local Schools campus is handicapped accessible.
Handicapped accessibility includes stadium parking located outside of stadium and stadium seating on both visitor and home sections, which are both clearly marked.

a.span: Click to access k12paymentcenter.com and create an on-line payment account. Student ID's are required for individual student accounts.
